original_title: Door To Forever: Bruce Hornsby's Lifelong Pursuit of the Unattainable
overview: This Bruce Hornsby documentary charts Bruce's life and career - his early years in Virginia and L.A. through The Way It Is, the Range, the Grateful Dead to the Noisemakers and the present day.
title: Door To Forever: Bruce Hornsby's Lifelong Pursuit of the Unattainable
